TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_slab
inventory=[{"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 20}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a birch_slab, I need to place birch_planks into the crafting grid. I will start by moving the first birch_planks from slot 36 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_slab
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 20}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}]

thought: Now that I have moved the first birch_planks into the crafting grid, I need to move the second birch_planks into the crafting grid. I will move the second birch_planks from slot 36 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
